name: Open Spaces - Beta -PC
description:
Skylar is an art student suffering agoraphobia and anxiety. Walter is an unhoused person suffering intense social anxiety and post-traumatic stress disorder. Navigate their stories to discover their symptomology, learn about their community supports, and how they manage their disorders. 

More than two hundred and sixty million people worldwide suffer from anxiety; more than sixty million suffer agoraphobia. It is our hope that this game will help sufferers find their own paths to recovery and symptom management, and to enable their communities and loved ones to more constructively assist them in that process. We hope you like Open Spaces! 

CW: This game may contain subject matter that may make some users uncomfortable or triggered, including symptomology, alcohol usage, and others. If you feel triggered, don't continue play! Take some time for yourself and continue if and when you feel ready.

Everyone who purchases the beta will receive the full game at no additional cost!
